Hospital.Controllers

Class AdministratorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.LoginController<HospitalAdministrator>
      • Hospital.Controllers.AdministratorController

  • public class AdministratorController
extends LoginController<HospitalAdministrator>
    LoginController for the Hospital Administrator. This enables the following usecase: Advance Time.

    • Method Detail

      • advanceTime

        public void advanceTime(WorldController wc,
               TimeArgument arg)
                 throws InvalidTimeException
        Advances the time in the world.
        Parameters:
        wc - the world in which to advance the time
        arg - a TimeArgument with as answer the time to advance to
        Throws:
        InvalidTimeException - the given time has already passed
